participant_2.background:
I enjoy my job , as a teacher.
I live in a big city.
I enjoy video games.
Magic mike is my favorite movie.
I enjoy singing.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy playing video games and singing.
Cool! I like to play video games too. What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of games, but my favorite genre is probably action RPGs.
I love action RPGs too! What are some of your favorite games?
I love the Witcher series, the Dark Souls series, and the Mass Effect series.
Those are all great games! I've played all of them except for the Mass Effect series.
You should definitely play the Mass Effect series. It's one of the best sci-fi games ever made.
I'll check it out. What about you? What do you like to do for fun?
I like to sing. I'm in a choir and I also like to sing karaoke.
Oh cool! I love to sing too. I used to be in a choir when I was younger.
Me too! I was in a choir when I was in high school.
What kind of music do you like to sing?
I like to sing all kinds of music, but my favorite genre is probably pop.
I love pop music too! I'm a big fan of Taylor Swift.
Me too! I love Taylor Swift. She's so talented.
She is! I'm excited for her new album.
Me too! I'm sure it's going to be great.
